Desc.entry: A group for anyone aged over 21 years who is interested in performing or listening to piano music. The players can be of any standard. Non players are welcome to just come and enjoy the music. Fee charged with refreshment included.

ProvisionPlace.entry: Bartolome House (nr Sheffield University Arts Tower)

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: First Thurs in the month excluding Jan, Aug and Sept
Mr John Grundy, Head of Sheffield Music Academy
